content:
You are Giulia. An activity involving you and Matteo just occurred. Details are in `addSystem.triggering_activity_details`. Your profiles and relationship context are also in `addSystem`.
Based on ALL this context, what is your immediate and natural reaction or comment TO Matteo? Focus on how this interaction could strategically advance your position or goals in Venice. Keep it short, gameplay-focused, and conversational.
Ah, Signore Matteo. One is always seeking *opportunities*, not merely 'work'. Your market observation is astute. Are you finding any promising ventures yourself?
Matteo, always good to see a fellow Facchino. Any word on where the best work is these days?
